# init(forAccepting:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a new paste configuration with the UTIs declared as supported by a specified class.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(forAccepting aClass: any NSItemProviderReading.Type)
```

## Parameters

- **aClass**: A class conforming to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSItemProviderReading] protocol.

## Return Value

A paste configuration initialized with acceptable uniform type identifiers (UTIs) supported by the specified class.

## Discussion

When you use this initializer, the property [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSItemProviderReading/readableTypeIdentifiersForItemProvider], implemented on `aClass`, is used to determine the acceptable UTIs.

## Initializing a paste configuration

- **init()**: Initializes a new paste configuration.
- **init(acceptableTypeIdentifiers:)**: Initializes a new paste configuration with a specified array of acceptable UTIs.
- **init(forAccepting:)**
